title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Wednesday, July 26 (game #548)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: ChatGPT lands on Android in the United States – here's how to use it
description: Now available on the world's most popular OS, ChatGPT on Android works very similarly to the desktop and iOS renditions.

title: Threads is outpacing Twitter after finally getting a Following feed
description: Threads is finally getting one of its most requested features, and could soon be a real threat to Twitter.

title: Pixel Watch 2 and Apple Watch Ultra 2 are rumored to adopt a featherweight design
description: Recent leaks says the Pixel Watch 2 will feature aluminum design while the Apple Watch Ultra 2 will use 3D printed parts

title: Some top AMD chips have a major security flaw
description: AMD Zen 2 flaw allowed threat actors to exfiltrate encryption keys, giving access to sensitive information.

title: New Armored Core 6 preview shows off lightning-fast combat and massive bosses
description: Bandai Namco has dropped a 10-minute-long Armored Core 6 preview, showing off combat, mech customization, and hints as to the game's plot.

title: EA Sports FC 24 celebrates Gianluca Vialli as part of a Hero reveal
description: EA Sports FC 24 has revealed that Gianluca Vialli is part of the game's first Heroes and will be available in Ultimate Team.

title: iPhone 15 sounding dull? The next iPhones could have bezel-free displays
description: Apple has apparently asked display partners to make bezel-free OLED displays for iPhones. Is that really what we want?

title: Phishing could be the most dangerous security threat you face this year - here’s how to stay safe
description: Stay protected from phishing threats with these top tips.

title: Apple is rolling out some urgent iPhone and Mac security patches, so update now
description: Apple issues yet more patches to fix critical security flaws, some of which are part of a wider malicious campaign.

title: Microsoft Outlook wants to make sure you never lose that vital email again
description: Never come up short again with these new Microsoft Outlook updates.

title: Hackers are targeting US critical infrastructure using this Citrix zero-day
description: Citrix urges users to apply the fix ASAP, with US critical infrastructure among those affected.

title: World’s highest capacity PCIe SSD hits 61TB, and you could fit two in your PC
description: It's a sign of things to come, but Solidigm’s mammoth SSD will be useless for end users.

title: Metal Gear Solid 3 remake release date, gameplay, and everything we know
description: A remake of Metal Gear Solid 3 is in the works, and with little information available, we've got a lot to learn.

title: Lots of sensitive data is still being posted to ChatGPT
description: Usage of generative AI apps such as ChatGPT is only going to grow, so watch out for employees sharing company information.

title: Mid-size DJI Air 3 lands with dual cameras and huge flight-time boost
description: The successor to the single-camera DJI Air 2S is a massive update, adding a second camera and big flight-time boost.

title: Google's new plan for the future of the web has a lot of people worried - here's why
description: A proposed Web Environment Integrity API may soon require you to run specific software to get access to websites.

title: FiiO's JW1 headphones sound superb for sports and they're super affordable too
description: FiiO's new wireless over-ear headphones deliver huge battery life and should sound fantastic.

title: Two unloved Windows 11 apps are getting canned - but will their replacement be any better?
description: If you’re still using the Windows Mail and Calendar apps, brace yourself for a big move.

title: Watch Netflix on your phone? It just got easier to find the shows and movies you love
description: There's no excuse for saying there's nothing to watch now: Netflix is bringing the shows you'll like straight to your phone.

title: Microsoft’s Windows 11 Start menu tweak could be a real timesaver
description: Microsoft has had a few bright ideas for the Start menu in recent times, and here’s another.

title: My Radeon RX 7900 XT just got a lot more powerful, for free – thanks, AMD!
description: A new update to AMD’s Radeon Adrenalin software has seen performance leaps of as much as 67%.

title: Sorry Netflix, Prime Video's late 2023 line-up means I'll be cancelling my account
description: From Invincible season 2 and Gen V, to Reacher season 2 and Mr and Mrs Smith, Prime Video is going to be my go-to streamer later this year.

title: Microsoft Sharepoint went down for a really embarrassing reason
description: A German TLS certificate was accidentally applied to the main sharepoint.com Microsoft Sharepoint domain instead of sharepoint.de.

title: Windows 11’s next big update could arrive sooner than expected
description: Could we even see the 23H2 update land in a couple of months? There’s a chance of that, it seems...

title: Ubisoft won't be deleting your accounts full of games despite initial perception
description: After some confusion, it turns out that Ubisoft won't be deleting inactive accounts after a certain amount of time.

title: Star Wars Outlaws is introducing new worlds, but it can't escape this old one
description: Star Wars Outlaws' new behind-the-scenes trailer shows off all sorts of delightful new content. Also Tatooine is here.

title: Amazon Prime scams are on the rise - here are 4 ways to avoid them
description: Amazon has reached out to Prime members warning of an increase in scam tactics, here's how to avoid being caught out.

title: This nasty stalkerware was found spying on tens of thousands of phones
description: Spyhide stalkerware tracked down to an Iranian software company, with victims identified all over the globe.

title: Xbox Series X users will soon be able to map keyboard keys to their controllers
description: A new Xbox Series X update for Xbox Insiders has been rolled out which allows users to use keyboard keys on controllers.

title: Pizza-scented TMNT Xbox controller joins a long list of gamepads you can't buy
description: Microsoft's latest Xbox controller giveaway features a TMNT-themed gamepad that literally stinks of pizza.
